missionBriefing.title: [MISSION_BRIEFING]: De-Risking the Digital Frontier
missionBriefing.body: I spent 7+ years building and scaling complex applications for one of Mexico's largest universities. I saw firsthand how a single vulnerability, left unchecked, can compromise an entire system. My journey into cybersecurity wasn't a career change; it was a specialization. I don't just find vulnerabilitiesâ€”I understand how they were built in the first place. My experience as both a developer (Dev) and a security professional (Sec) is the foundation of DevCybSec.

projects.securityPosture: Security Posture: Responsible for protecting sensitive student data (PII), implementing secure authentication, and performing continuous code reviews to mitigate web vulnerabilities (XSS, SQLi) while developing new features.

projects.name: Freelance Taxi Application (Flutter / NestJS)
